alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 20 at 9:42AM MST until August 21 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Gila County, Yavapai County, much of Coconino County. This includes Payson, Prescott, Camp Verde, Cottonwood, Sedona, Flagstaff, Williams, Seligman, Ash Fork. * WHEN...From 1 PM MST this afternoon through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Flooding will be possible in creeks, normally dry washes, and swimming holes. Low-water crossings could also become flooded, which would create deadly travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A surge of tropical moisture will lead to an increased threat of thunderstorms producing heavy rainfall and flash flooding. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
